title: A President's Day
description: The President of the United States has a very important job. A President's Day takes the reader inside a typical day for the leader of the country, from sunup to sundown. Detailed photographs and high-frequency words support beginning readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast details, as well as the proper use of possessive nouns.
reviewWords: assistant, difficult, information, meetings, president, reporters
